The standard mode! Collect all notebooks to win!

Your legs are broken, but you have an infinite use grappling hook!
Note that Baldi will get twice as angry in this mode!

Principal of The Things are after you and will send you to detention if they see you!
Be sure to not give the detention room a door, and place Baldi inside!
